casebody.data:
In The Matter of The WILL OF Hector Cornelius McFAYDEN.
appealed by Propounder Mickey Jackson. No. 576P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. George Freeman, Jr., Alexander C. Dale, Wilmington, for Mickey Jackson. Randolph L. Worth, Raleigh, for Sherill. Steven C. Lawrence, Fayetteville, for Simon & Mary Burney. Jim Wade Goodman, Fayetteville, for Nunalee and Ransbotham. Prior report: 179 N.C.App. 595 , 635 S.E.2d 65 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 17th day of November 2006 by Caveators (Simon & Mary Burney) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th day of October 2007."

HUDSON, J., recused.
